### [**Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza**]{style="color:#990000"}
```{r heatmap_puebla}

                   cve_edo = "21",
                   locality = "Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza",
                   status_caso = c(1, 2),
                   kernel = 400,
                   week = c(1:53),
                   zoom = NULL,
                   map_type = NULL,
                   alpha = 0.6,

```
